item.title: About
item.description: My name is Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch (Chiang) I am a software engineer and a data analyst who is gliding around open-source development. I have experiences in using Python for various projects and applications ranging from its web frameworks, data manipulation, and data visualization. Additionally, I also have a fair experience developing and maintaining web-app projects using PHP and JS. I am also no stranger with a variety of databases (e.g., MySQL, Azure Cosmos DB, and MongoDB).
